search.query: | stats max(BasePointsAwarded) as BasePointsAwarded, max(SpeedBonusAwarded) as SpeedBonusAwarded, max(AdditionalBonusAwarded) as AdditionalBonusAwarded, max(Penalty) as Penalty, max(HintPenalty) as HintPenalty by user | stats sum(BasePointsAwarded) as BasePointsAwarded, sum(SpeedBonusAwarded) as SpeedBonusAwarded, sum(AdditionalBonusAwarded) as AdditionalBonusAwarded, sum(Penalty) as Penalty, sum(HintPenalty) as HintPenalty by user | eval Score = BasePointsAwarded + SpeedBonusAwarded + AdditionalBonusAwarded - Penalty - HintPenalty | sort - Score | streamstats count as Rank | eval panel = floor(Rank / 10) `get_user_info` | fields Rank Team Score panel
| where panel=0 | eval RankText="# " . Rank . ": " | eval RankbyTeam=RankText . Team | table RankbyTeam Score | rename RankbyTeam AS "Rank: Team"
